The salve amulet(i) is an upgraded version of the salve amulet that increases the wearer's damage and accuracy in Attack, Strength, and Ranged by 1/6th[1] while attacking undead monsters, as well as a 15% bonus to Magic.

It costs 800,000 Nightmare Zone points or 320 Zeal Tokens to imbue the salve amulet. Amulets imbued through Soul Wars do not count for completing the Ardougne Diary task.[2] An already imbued amulet can be upgraded to the Salve amulet(ei) by using Tarn's diary on it.

The salve amulet's effects do not stack with the black mask's (and by extension, the Slayer helm's). If both are worn, the salve amulet's effects take priority. However, it does stack with the set effect of Void Knight equipment. The amulet's effects do not work within Nightmare Zone.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. â†‘ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 10 September 2019. (Archived from the original on 26 April 2020.) Mod Ash: "It's 1/6, so 16% is closer."
  2. â†‘ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 3 February 2021. (Archived from the original on 5 February 2021.) Mod Ash: "Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place."

rawContent:
{{Infobox Item |version1 = Nightmare Zone |version2 = Soul Wars |name = Salve amulet(i) |image = [[File:Salve amulet(i).png]] |release1 = [[1 May]] [[2014]] |release2 = [[6 January]] [[2021]] |update1 = Spirit trees, clues & more! |update2 = Soul Wars And 20th Anniversary Event |members = Yes |quest = [[Haunted Mine]] |tradeable = No |placeholder = Yes |equipable = Yes |stackable = No |noteable = No |options = Wear, Uncharge |destroy = Drop |examine = Increases melee, ranged and magic damage & accuracy by 15%{{Sic|The correct value is 1/6th, equal to 16.67%.}} against the undead. |value1 = 1 |value2 =1 |weight1 = 0.007 |weight2 =0.007 |id1 = 12017 |id2 = 25250 }} [[File:Salve amulet(i) detail.png|left|150px]] The '''salve amulet(i)''' is an upgraded version of the [[salve amulet]] that increases the wearer's damage and accuracy in [[Attack]], [[Strength]], and [[Ranged]] by 1/6th{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1171387277655846913|date=10 September 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/QKT8B|archivedate=26 April 2020|quote=It's 1/6, so 16% is closer.}} while attacking [[undead (attribute)|undead]] monsters, as well as a 15% bonus to [[Magic]]. It costs 800,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] points or 320 [[Zeal Tokens]] to imbue the salve amulet. Amulets imbued through [[Soul Wars]] do not count for completing the [[Ardougne Diary]] task.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1356917400210448389|date=3 February 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.is/quete|archivedate=5 February 2021|quote=Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place.}} An already imbued amulet can be upgraded to the [[Salve amulet(ei)]] by using [[Tarn's diary]] on it. The salve amulet's effects do not stack with the [[black mask]]'s (and by extension, the [[Slayer helm]]'s). If both are worn, the salve amulet's effects take priority. However, it does stack with the [[set effect]] of [[Void Knight equipment]]. The amulet's effects do not work within Nightmare Zone. {{Infobox Bonuses |version1 = Nightmare Zone |version2 = Soul Wars |smwname1 = Nightmare Zone |smwname2 = Soul Wars |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic = 0 |arange = 0 |dstab = +3 |dslash = +3 |dcrush = +3 |dmagic = 0 |drange = 0 |str = 0 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = +3 |slot = neck |image = [[File:Salve amulet equipped.png|110px]] |altimage = [[File:Salve amulet(i) equipped female.png|110px]] }} ==Creation== {{Recipe |facilities = Dom Onion's Reward Shop |members = Yes |ticks = |mat1 = Salve amulet |mat1cost = no |mat2 = Nightmare Zone points |mat2quantity = 800000 |mat2pic = Minigame map icon |mat2cost = {{#expr:10 * ({{GEP|Grimy guam leaf|32/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy marrentill|24/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy tarromin|18/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy harralander|14/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy ranarr weed|11/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy irit leaf|8/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy avantoe|6/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy kwuarm|5/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy cadantine|4/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy lantadyme|3/128}} + {{GEP|Grimy dwarf weed|3/128}}) / 9500}} |mat2itemnote = Value based on the expected average value of spending Nightmare Zone points on [[Herb box|herb boxes]]. |output1 = Salve amulet(i) |output1cost = no }} ==Affected monsters== {{Bestiarytable|fromlevel=1|tolevel=2000|levelsort=no|attribute=undead}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 8 August 2019 |update = Smithing and Silver Crafting Interfaces |poll = |change = Some brown patches near the salve shard around the amulet's inventory icon have been removed. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Salve amulet(i) (v1) detail.png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Salve amulet(i) detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Salve amulet(i) v1.png|center]] |[[File:Salve amulet(i).png|center]] |- |1 May 2014 â€“
8 August 2019 |8 August 2019 â€“
present |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Amulets}} {{Prayer items}} {{Nightmare Zone}} {{Soul Wars}}
